meanings.definition: An instrument used to measure electrical activity in muscles.
meanings.sent1: The electromyograph helped the doctor see how well my muscles were working.
meanings.sent2: The scientist used the electromyograph to study the muscle activity of the athlete.
meanings.sent3: The electromyograph beeped happily as it measured the muscle signals.
meanings.sent4: The electromyograph was like a detective, uncovering the secrets of muscle electricity.
meanings.sent5: With the electromyograph, the muscle activity looked like a colorful dance of electricity.

meanings.definition: To record the electrical activity produced by skeletal muscles.
meanings.sent1: I will electromyograph your muscles to check for any irregularities.
meanings.sent2: The doctor decided to electromyograph the patient's leg muscles.
meanings.sent3: He electromyographed his own muscles just for fun, pretending to be a scientist.
meanings.sent4: She electromyographs the muscles with precision, like an artist painting with electricity.
meanings.sent5: Electromyographing the muscles revealed a world of electrical signals beneath the skin.
